### NAC Foundation Audit Services 
#### Request for Proposal 

The National Arts Centre Foundation (NACF) invites qualified firms to submit proposals for the provision of annual audit services for the fiscal year ending August 31, 2025.

**Summary**

The objective of this engagement is to ensure accurate and reliable financial reporting in accordance with industry standards and regulatory requirements.

**Key Dates**

*   Publication Date: May 07, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: June 07, 2024 at 17:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: September 01, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2025

**Terms and Conditions**

*   Tender submissions and registration are free of charge
*   Bidders must first register on the [NAC Website](https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/) and create an online profile
*   Respondents are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of their submissions
*   Documents obtained from sources other than the official website will not be recognized during the bid and award process

**Selection Criteria**

*   NAC shall review all proposals submitted in compliance with this RFP for suitability and may enter into an agreement
*   The selection criteria will be based on the suitability of the proposals submitted

**Contact Information**

*   Ojinika Osuji, Contracting Authority
*   Phone: 343-588-0621
*   Email: [nacprocurement@nac-cna.ca](mailto:nacprocurement@nac-cna.ca)

Note to editor: 
Please ensure you format this output in markdown, and respect the 400-word limitation. Do not duplicate any information and be clear in your formatting. 

**Attachments**

Please find the RFP documents on the [NAC Website](https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/projects/73705).
